titleStmt.title: Unto His Grace, His Majesty's High Commissioner, and the Right Honourable, the Estates of Parliament. The humble petition of Margaret Lady Dowager of Belhaven.
titleStmt.author: Belhaven, Margaret Hamilton, Baroness, fl. 1695.

notesStmt.note: Concerning a bond of 13000 marks given to Mr. William Brown on the Belhaven estates.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
